title: READY 2 LEARN Triangle Grip Paint Brushes - Set of 6 - 18m+ - Easy to Grip Paint Brushes for 2, 3 and 4 Year Olds - Encourage Writing Grip
description: Paint fantastic creations and promote tripod grip with Triangle Grip Paint Brushes. This set includes 6 paint brushes with triangular-shaped handles. Ideal for those with special needs, Triangle Grip Paint Brushes rest comfortably in small hands for greater artistic control. The triangle shape also promotes proper writing grip. Made of durable rubber with natural hog hair bristles, these paint brushes will last for many painting sessions! As children paint, they develop imagination, creative expression, hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. The brushes come clean with warm soap and water, which makes them an ideal classroom accessory! || Colors may vary. For ages 18m+. || Size: 6. 25”L x 0. 9”W.
